text: Altona is an unincorporated community in Bates County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== Altona was platted in 1860, and named after Altoona, Pennsylvania, the native home of a first settler. A post office called Altona was established in 1868, and remained in operation until 1920. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Bates County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Altona, Missouri
